mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mycoupon WHERE uid=#{userId} and cid=#{couponid}

SELECT mc.id, mc.uid, mc.cid, mc.used, mc.udate, mc.rdate, c.name as cname, c.sdate, c.edate, c.sale, c.text FROM mycoupon as mc INNER JOIN coupon as c ON mc.cid=c.id WHERE date_format(sysdate(),'%Y%m%d') >= sdate and date_format(sysdate(),'%Y%m%d') <= edate and uid=#{uid} and used=1 ORDER BY c.sale DESC
SELECT mc.id, mc.uid, mc.used, mc.udate, mc.rdate, cp.text from mycoupon mc INNER JOIN coupon cp ON cp.id = mc.cid INNER JOIN cust c ON c.id = mc.uid WHERE mc.uid = #{id} AND mc.used = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE mycoupon SET uid=#{uid}, cid=#{cid}, used=#{used}, udate=sysdate(), rdate=#{rdate} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE mycoupon SET used=0,udate=SYSDATE() WHERE id =#{id};
